name: REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., Petitioners, v. Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, and as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., Petitioners,
v.
Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, and as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied. Justice Kavanaugh took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
casebody.head_matter:
REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., Petitioners,
v.
Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, and as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.
No. 17-1406.
Supreme Court of the United States.
May 26, 2020
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied. Justice Kavanaugh took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
